verses.verse: וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> vay-Hi become אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> 'ish man אֶחָ֜ד <WH259> 'e-Chad Now there was a certain מִן־ <WH4480> min- at הָרָמָתַ֛יִם ha-ra-ma-Ta-yim צוֹפִ֖ים <WH7436> tzo-Fim of Ramathaimzophim מֵהַ֣ר <WH2022> me-Har of mount אֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim; Ephraim וּשְׁמ֡וֹ <WH8034> u-she-Mo and his name אֶ֠לְקָנָה <WH511> 'El-ka-nah [was] Elkanah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יְרֹחָ֧ם <WH3395> ye-ro-Cham of Jeroham בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אֱלִיה֛וּא <WH453> 'e-li-Hu of Elihu בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son תֹּ֥חוּ <WH8459> To-chu of Tohu בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son צ֖וּף <WH6689> tzuf of Zuph אֶפְרָתִֽי׃ <WH673> 'ef-ra-Ti. an Ephrathite
